title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S6, Tab S6 Lite, and Tab S7 FE start receiving Android 12 update with One UI 4.1
content:
Over the last few days, Samsung has rolled out the One UI 4.1 update for several of its flagship models. But while the companyâ€™s smartphones are getting the latest iteration of One UI based on Android 12, most of its tablets are stuck on older versions of Android. Thankfully, the Korean OEM is finally getting

The post Samsung Galaxy Tab S6, Tab S6 Lite, and Tab S7 FE start receiving Android 12 update with One UI 4.1 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has started rolling out the One UI 4.1 update based on Android 12 to the Galaxy Tab S6, Tab S6 Lite, and the Galaxy Tab S7 FE.
